entries.title: Biden announces asylum restrictions to ‘control border’
entries.description: Immigration is a top issue for many voters, and a possible threat to Biden's reelection chances.

entries.title: India's Modi claims victory as he heads for reduced majority
entries.description: The PM says his third term is a historic feat, but his majority has been greatly reduced.

entries.title: Fires in northern Israel fuel demands to tackle escalation with Hezbollah
entries.description: Rocket attacks have sparked days of bushfires near Israel's border with Lebanon.

entries.title: Hunter Biden 'crossed line' when he bought gun, trial hears
entries.description: The US first lady seemed to get emotional in court as she listened to opening statements in Hunter Biden's trial.

entries.title: Grammy-winning producer accused of raping woman in van
entries.description: The-Dream, whose real name is Terius Gesteelde-Diamant, denies the allegations.

entries.title: TikTok says cyber-attack hit brands and celebrities
entries.description: The video-sharing app told the BBC that a "very limited" number of accounts had been compromised.

entries.title: Heat dome brings dangerous weather to western US
entries.description: More than 34 million Americans in the western US are under excessive heat advisories this week.

entries.title: What worked for India's Modi - and what didn’t?
entries.description: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his party have won the most seats in this year's election.

entries.title: US expert panel votes against MDMA therapy
entries.description: US health regulator advisers have voted against a therapy based on MDMA for PTSD patients.

entries.title: 'Tornado-like' storm devastates town in South Africa
entries.description: A 'tornado-looking' storm has killed at least 10 people after it hit several provinces on Monday.

entries.title: Germany's deadly floods spread along Danube
entries.description: Flood waters are continuing to rise in parts of southern Germany, and are now spreading down the Danube to Austria and Hungary.

entries.title: Mexican mayor killed hours after first woman elected president
entries.description: The killing of Yolanda Sanchez comes just hours after a historic landslide victory for Mexico's first woman president.

entries.title: 'Mansplaining' French PM accused of sidelining colleague
entries.description: Gabriel Attal burst on to a broadcast featuring his party’s lead EU election candidate Valérie Hayer.

entries.title: Injured Djokovic withdraws from French Open
entries.description: Defending champion Novak Djokovic withdraws from the French Open with a knee injury before his quarter-final.

entries.title: US woman declared dead found alive at funeral home
entries.description: The 74-year-old was given CPR and rushed to hospital, where she was later pronounced dead - for a second time.

entries.title: Arrests, accusations and AI: India’s election unpacked
entries.description: On 4 June, Indians will find out who governs their country for the next five years.

entries.title: RAF flypast for D-Day veterans on ferry to France
entries.description: The veterans are sailing to France from the UK to commemorate the 80th anniversary of the Normandy landings.

entries.title: First images of Hawaii's Kilauea volcano erupting
entries.description: Helicopter overflight of Hawaii's Kilauea volcano after eruption.

entries.title: Video shows air rescue after man falls from cliff in LA
entries.description: Firefighters airlifted the man to hospital after he fell nearly 30ft (9m) from a seaside cliff on Sunday.

entries.title: Son's funny faces overshadow lawmaker's House speech
entries.description: Representative John Rose was denouncing Donald Trump's guilty conviction as his son sat behind him.

entries.title: Americans react to Trump's guilty conviction
entries.description: The ex-president was found guilty on all counts of falsifying business records. Americans have mixed opinions about the verdict.

entries.title: Trump would run for president from jail, his lawyer says
entries.description: Alina Habba says Donald Trump will run for office even if he is jailed and "nothing will change" following his conviction for falsifying business records.

entries.title: ‘Aposiopesis’: Watch 12-year-old win US Spelling Bee
entries.description: Bruhat Soma correctly spelled words like ‘caixinha’ and ‘sciniph’ to take home the $50,000 prize.

entries.title: Mesmerising lava rivers as Icelandic volcano erupts
entries.description: Lava continues to spurt from from a volcanic system in Reykjanes Peninsula, after Wednesday's powerful eruption.

entries.title: District Attorney on Trump verdict: ‘I did my job’
entries.description: Alvin Bragg thanked the jury and prosecutors for their work "following the facts and the law". He said his team at the Manhattan District Attorney’s office had treated this case like they would any other, despite the defendant - a former president...

entries.title: Australia wants to become a renewable energy superpower. Can it?
entries.description: The country has come up with an ambitious plan to become the engine room of the new green economy.

entries.title: Why India's Modi failed to win outright majority
entries.description: Mr Modi has lost some of his aura of invincibility and the results mean the opposition is back.

entries.title: Steaming dim sum triumphs among winning food photos
entries.description: The image is on display in London, alongside all the finalists in the food photograper contest.

entries.title: Cost of going green sparks backlash from Europe's voters
entries.description: Voters demanded action against climate change in 2019 elections, but resistance has since broken out.

entries.title: Behind the 'Zuma tsunami' in South Africa
entries.description: The ex-president has been hit by a number of scandals but emerges once again to play a big role.

entries.title: Gaza ceasefire plan turns into deadly game of survival
entries.description: The plan outlined by President Biden could end the war, but both sides want to get their way.

entries.title: Gazans returning to Jabalia describe 'horrifying' destruction
entries.description: Palestinians returning to the camp in northern Gaza express shock at the level of devastation they found.

entries.title: The billionaires rallying behind Trump after his conviction
entries.description: The Trump campaign has seen upticks in fundraising during pivotal moments of his legal battles.
